thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Art of the Blocked Deal
President Trump blocked Broadcom’s $117 billion bid for Qualcomm, in effect ending what would have been the technology industry’s biggest deal ever. The action comes after the Committee on Foreign Investment in the U.S. said it was worried that Broadcom, which has a reputation as a cost-cutting behemoth, would stymie research and development at the U.S. chip maker and weaken it against foreign rivals, such as China’s Huawei, in the race to develop 5G technology. Singapore-based Broadcom... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
